/* * This rules file serves as a template for how rules should be * supplied to the filter. Each rules is an array with one to two * values. The first value is the pattern as a string. * * e.g. [ "wish\\.com" ] * * Notice that the litteral dot needs to be escaped. In order to * escape a character in regex, you can use a backslash. This file * requires a double backslash because that is also the escape * character in JSON. * * Flags can be supplied as well. The second item in a rule array * represents theses flags. * * e.g. [ "[a-z0-9]yelp\\.com/", "i" ] * */ { "ip": [ ], "from": [ ], "subject": [ ], "content": [ ], "to": [ ] }
